Class: Foursquare

Foursquare

new Foursquare()

This is the Foursquare class. It handles Foursquare API integration, searching for venues, and retrieving tips.

get_reviews(venue, LatLng) → {Object.Deferred}

Get Reviews. Return the tips for a specific location, given its name and lat/long coords. Upon successful return of a suitable venue, it retrieves retrieve the tips. This function returns a Promise.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
venue String Venue name
LatLng Object LatLng object of the desired location
Source:
  • src/js/common.js, line 290
Returns:
Deferred Promise. Upon success, returns venue and venue_tips
Type
Object.Deferred

get_tip(i) → {Object.Tip}

Get Tip Returns a specific tip, from the collection of Tips. Used by {@link: Map#create_infownd} to facilitate dealing with empty tips array or undefined object (if failed to retrieve tips)
Parameters:
Name Type Description
i Int index of the tip to return (0-based) from the Foursquare collection
Source:
  • src/js/common.js, line 337
Returns:
The instance i-th from the Tips collection
Type
Object.Tip
